name: Code Quiz
info: This Project gave me my first real experience with using javascript. Creating a Quiz functionality and messing with the DOM to render different questions. Also using local storage for getting the users name and displaying it at the end of the quiz.

name: Weather App
info: This was the first project using api calls and rendering it to the DOM. Created using Javascript, Jquery and Ajax calls.

name: Dream Destination
info: This was a group project that used API calls and a search form to get the information of a certain area that you would want to visit, also will display the current weather there also.

name: Eat-The-Burger
info: This app was created using express server and MySql. The point of the project was to show that you can change the status of data and resend it to the DB with routes for it to re render on the HTML

name: DadLife App
info: This was a group project that used MySql as well as express Server. The point of the App was to create a community for Dad Jokes and Dad profiles. We had used passport fo the authentication. I created the design and layout as well as the logos and icons.
